# Osalussoovid CanSati projekti

Kui soovid osaleda CanSati projektis, palun kirjuta oma nimi tabelisse \@ref(tab:cansat-participants) leheküljel `r render_pageref(reference="tab:cansat-participants")`. CanSati projektis osalejaile seome võimalikult palju õpiväljundeid CanSati projektiga. CanSati projektis saad ehitada purksatelliidi ja seda kasutada.

```{r label="cansat-participants", echo=FALSE}
participant <- c(
  "Zahar Orikovi",
  "Andrei Aksjonov",
  "Sergo Klišin",
  "Maksim Mihhailov",
  "\\blank{Margarita Mussijenko}",
  "\\blank{Margarita Mussijenko}",
  "\\blank{Margarita Mussijenko}",
  "\\blank{Margarita Mussijenko}",
  "\\blank{Margarita Mussijenko}",
  "\\blank{Margarita Mussijenko}",
  "\\blank{Margarita Mussijenko}",
  "\\blank{Margarita Mussijenko}"
)

data_frame_of_participation_wishes_in_cansat <- data.frame(
  participant
)

colnames(data_frame_of_participation_wishes_in_cansat) <- c(
  "Õpilase nimi"
)

rownames(data_frame_of_participation_wishes_in_cansat) <- c(1:12)

print_table(
  table <- data_frame_of_participation_wishes_in_cansat,
  caption <- "Osalemissoovid CanSati projektis."
)

```
